tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wildlife_sightings (
  sighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  observer_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE wildlife_sightings (
    sighting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    species VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    observer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE location_info (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    terrain_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE adventurers(
    adventurer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender CHAR,
    experience_level VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE excursions(
    excursion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    distance FLOAT,
    adventurer_id INT REFERENCES adventurers(adventurer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sightings (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    observer_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR,
    region VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Observers (
    observer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    observer_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR,
    scientific_name VARCHAR,
    conservation_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Regions (
    region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR,
    climate VARCHAR,
    ecosystem VARCHAR
)
